alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 6:17AM AKST until December 24 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT SNOWFALL FOR PARTS OF SE AK THROUGH CHRISTMAS... Multiple frontal bands will pass over the panhandle through the weekend bringing periods of snow. The first band on Friday will start with light, dry, snow tracking northward across the area. The snow will become wetter over the southern panhandle. A break or decrease in snowfall rates will occur before the second frontal band tracks northward into the southern panhandle early Saturday. This front will bring another round of snow and a chance of freezing rain. The south will change to all rain while the north sees snow tapering off or mixing with freezing rain Saturday night. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected late Friday night through early Saturday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
